Instructions.Title: How to play:
Instructions.Step1: Select one of your checkers pieces.
Instructions.Step2: Squares on the board will light up as possible new places for your piece to move.
Instructions.Step3: View the possble moves and select one of the options for your piece to go.
Instructions.Step4: The goal is to move your pieces further up the board, while trying to 'jump' over your opponent's pieces.
Instructions.Step5: Pieces can only move diaginol and forward, and pieces that are 'jumped' over are eliminated.
Instructions.Step6: You should play stratigically to protect your pieces and take out as many of your opponents to win. Good luck!
